version_description: Minor fixes.
Minor fixes.
The Player Stats are now working again.  Everyone's stats had to get reset to fix the problem.
The Player Stats are now working again.  Everyone's stats had to get reset to fix the problem.
Minor tweak to voice chat code.
Minor tweak to voice chat code.

Major update!  We've added in a whole new "Reward Points" system where you can earn Reward Points for playing the game and performing other tasks.  These reward points can be redeemed for free planes!  Every time you play a multiplayer battle you will get points, and every plane you shoot down gives you points as well.  Once you have enough points you can choose which planes you'd like to redeem them for.

To learn more about the Reward Points select "Rewards & Upgrades" from the game's Main Menu, and then tap the "Rewards" button at the top of the dialog that appears.

Fixed bug on the Redeem dialog where a certain plane didn't properly get redeemed.
Fixed bug on the Redeem dialog where a certain plane didn't properly get redeemed.

Completely rewrote ad system.  iAd has been discontinued, so that has been removed and replaced with a new ad provider.  You can still permanently remove all ads from the game simply by buying any Level or Plane Pack upgrade.

Completely rewrote ad system.  iAd has been discontinued, so that has been removed and replaced with a new ad provider.  You can still permanently remove all ads from the game simply by buying any Level or Plane Pack upgrade.
Minor bug fix.
Minor bug fix.
Internal improvements and fixes.
Internal improvements and fixes.
Fixes a bug.
Fixes a bug.

• LIVE BROADCASTING!!!  New in Air Wings 11 is Live Broadcasting using ReplayKit.  Let others watch your battles live with this new feature, and it's simple to use.  When playing a game simply pause it to bring up the Pause Menu.  If you're running iOS 10 or later you will see a new menu item labeled "Start Broadcasting Gameplay".  The camera icon in the upper-left corner will light up to indicate that you are live.  To stop live broadcasting you just tap the camera icon.

• CUSTOM AVATARS:  In all previous versions of Air Wings the other players would see your Game Center photo (avatar) above your plane which let them identify you.  The game will uses this by default, but to make things work well with iOS 10 we have added the ability to set your avatar image directly in the game itself.  Just go to the Settings screen and at the bottom you'll see the option to select an image from your photo library to use as your Avatar.  This avatar image will take precedent over your Game Center image.

• LIVE BROADCASTING!!!  New in Air Wings 11 is Live Broadcasting using ReplayKit.  Let others watch your battles live with this new feature, and it's simple to use.  When playing a game simply pause it to bring up the Pause Menu.  If you're running iOS 10 or later you will see a new menu item labeled "Start Broadcasting Gameplay".  The camera icon in the upper-left corner will light up to indicate that you are live.  To stop live broadcasting you just tap the camera icon.

• CUSTOM AVATARS:  In all previous versions of Air Wings the other players would see your Game Center photo (avatar) above your plane which let them identify you.  The game will uses this by default, but to make things work well with iOS 10 we have added the ability to set your avatar image directly in the game itself.  Just go to the Settings screen and at the bottom you'll see the option to select an image from your photo library to use as your Avatar.  This avatar image will take precedent over your Game Center image.
Fixed some bugs relating to the new ReplayKit Broadcasting capability.
Fixed some bugs relating to the new ReplayKit Broadcasting capability.

Disabled voice chat on devices running iOS 10 due to critical bug in GameKit on iOS 10 which caused the game to malfunction when Voice Chat was toggled.  Voice Chat will be reinstated on iOS 10 once Apple fixes the issue.

Disabled voice chat on devices running iOS 10 due to critical bug in GameKit on iOS 10 which caused the game to malfunction when Voice Chat was toggled.  Voice Chat will be reinstated on iOS 10 once Apple fixes the issue.
Maintenance update.  Tweaked some game connection code, and removed some banner ads from the game.  Updated some 3rd party libraries.
Maintenance update.  Tweaked some game connection code, and removed some banner ads from the game.  Updated some 3rd party libraries.
Major internal update.  The code now uses ARC, so the game should be more stable.  Please report any crashes.
Major internal update.  The code now uses ARC, so the game should be more stable.  Please report any crashes.

Added a new "Rematch" menu option which lets you see the last 100 players that you've battled, and you can invite them to a rematch.  So, now when you select Multiplayer from the menu it will show you a new screen which lets you select "Automatch" or "Rematch".  The Automatch is the usual Game Center automatch, but selecting Rematch will bring up the list of most recently played players.  On this Rematch screen there is a "Automatch Empty Slots" switch.  When turned ON and you select less than 3 players to invite to the rematch Game Center will automatch the remaining slots to try and get a 4-way match.  When left OFF it will make the invite a private match with only the players you invite to rematch.  There is also a text field where you can enter a message to send to the player(s) you are inviting.

Additional stability fixes.

So, now when you select Multiplayer from the menu it will show you a new screen which lets you select "Automatch" or "Rematch".  The Automatch is the usual Game Center automatch, but selecting Rematch will bring up the list of most recently played players.  On this Rematch screen there is a "Automatch Empty Slots" switch.  When turned ON and you select less than 3 players to invite to the rematch Game Center will automatch the remaining slots to try and get a 4-way match.  When left OFF it will make the invite a private match with only the players you invite to rematch.  There is also a text field where you can enter a message to send to the player(s) you are inviting.

We've added 13 new levels to the game!  The "Galactic Pack" brings all of the levels from Air Wings Intergalactic to Air Wings.  So, you can now fly around the Ice Fortress, Moon Base, The Ruins, etc.!!!

This version also fixes some stability issues, and now shows a progress bar in the Connection dialog, so you can have a better idea of what's going on during the Multiplayer connection process.

We've added 13 new levels to the game!  The "Galactic Pack" brings all of the levels from Air Wings Intergalactic to Air Wings.  So, you can now fly around the Ice Fortress, Moon Base, The Ruins, etc.!!!

This version also fixes some stability issues, and now shows a progress bar in the Connection dialog, so you can have a better idea of what's going on during the Multiplayer connection process.

•  Fixed numerous issues including some map problems and crashing bugs.
•  Implemented a 24 hour Free Trial period for new users during which they have free access to all the planes and levels.
•  New Players Online counter.

• Now shows player stats on the multiplayer connecting screen.  When connecting with other players running 12.1 you'll see their Win Ratio and Flake Out ratio, so you can see what you're up against.

• Now shows player stats on the multiplayer connecting screen.  When connecting with other players running 12.1 you'll see their Win Ratio and Flake Out ratio, so you can see what you're up against.
• Bug fixes
• Fewer ads

• No more banner ads!
• Added a new feature to Rematch.  At the bottom left corner of the Rematch dialog you will see a Map button.  That will display a map showing the locations of the players you have recently played.  Don't worry, to protect everyone's privacy the exact locations have been randomized to be within about 4 kilometers.

Don't worry, to protect everyone's privacy the exact locations have been randomized to be within about 4 kilometers.

Voice chat is back!  Apple fixed (mostly) Voice Chat in iOS 11.3, so we've turned the feature back on!  It will only be available for those running iOS 9 or iOS 11.3 and later because the feature was broken from iOS 10 - 11.2.  So, be sure to install iOS 11.3 to enjoy the verbal bashing.

Added a new "Rematch" button on the Game Stats screen, so now you can easily and quickly rematch the players in the last game.  Previously, you had to select Rematch from the main menu and then manually select the players to rematch.  That option is still there, but with this new Rematch button you have a shortcut.  The button is next to the Done button in the upper-left corner of the Game Stats screen that appears at the end of a game.

We've removed all of the ads in the free version!  Well, they're gone at least for now.  We're experimenting with the idea to see if removing ads will increase the number of players online, and if it works this change will be permanent.
